message: I think a 60/40 split is fair for us to start. What do you think, Bob?
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering I'm the one making the offer this round.  Let's see if we can reach a deal.
Bob, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a 57/43 split.  It's closer to the middle ground and accounts for the time pressure.
